display_name: Quality of Life (SHHS2): Felt downhearted and blue
description: 9. These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past 4 weeks.  For each question, check the box for the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling.  During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time. f. Have you felt downhearted and blue?
